80.title: Gran Final PNP 2
80.plot: The culmination of a legendary history of timeless human conflicts is facing an entire country. Barbara's vital signs were diluted amid the crying of Mercedes and Nicanor. The outcome of a love and a dream encounter have in the background the melody that united them. Isabel Quiroga wanted to finish with the architects of the suffering that caused her. The balance of his judgment was completely lost and she could only cling to the only one he had left: her son. The time for Armando Quiroga's payday arrived. 49.title: Dinero y poder
49.plot: Armando Quiroga was transferred to the hospital in Chillán where he is being evaluated after the strong heart attack he gave him after arguing with Gerardo. However, he asks the priest not to mention anything about the attacks he has been given and decides to hide it until the end. For his part, Camilo is transferred to the prison of Chillán and his family is very sad. During his departure, Fuenzalida hits Corcuera. Augusta discovers that her husband Carlitos slept with another woman in his bachelor party and leaves him, in addition, Maria Elsa continues living the ...

227.title: La desaparición
227.plot: Estela arrived at her house to tell a tragic news to her entire family: Father Reynaldo passed away. Immediately Maria Elsa's face became unconfigured. And he can not believe that his great love was dead, however, he began to suspect a person. Whose will it be?

229.title: Visita inesperada
229.plot: 1960 began with great surprises in Forgive Our Sins and is that things have changed after 15 months. Isabel, is admitted to a psychiatric center where, apparently, it gets worse over time; every time it is more confused and lost. On the other hand, María Elsa has not been able to forget Reynaldo and, after a call she received on December 31st, Quiroga's daughter steeled herself and went to the Cajón del Maipo to look for the love of her life. Her biggest surprise is that she really found it there.

232.title: Gran Final PNP
232.plot: Season One Finale. Father Reynaldo wants to resume his work at Villa Ruiseñor. Armando Quiroga will not rest until the priest dies. The problem? Lamberto will not rest until he takes revenge for his own hands and assassinate Quiroga.

imdb.plot outline: Armando Quiroga is the wealthiest and most powerful man in Villa Ruiseñor. He has built a lovely home with his aristocrat wife, Estela, and their children. Quiroga has achieved all of his dreams but his life is about to be shaken by his own actions. While he partakes in a forbidden affair, his daughter, Maria Elsa, has fallen in love with the son of the housemaid, challenging the most important rule of their time: the division of social classes. And, the arrival of Reynaldo Suarez, the new priest in Villa Ruiseñor, means more trouble for Armando. Maria Elsa quickly becomes seduced by this priest's charm, unable to avoid the romance that begins escalating between them. This priest will find himself stuck at a crossroads: keeping his faith or succumbing to a woman's love.
imdb.title: Perdona Nuestros Pecados
plot: It is the story of a powerful family of the Chilean high aristocracy in the decade of the 50's. A clan led by the fearsome Armando Quiroga, where intrigue, suspense and romance build a story of passion in times of hypocrisy.

Armando Quiroga is the wealthiest and most powerful man in Villa Ruiseñor. He has built a lovely home with his aristocrat wife, Estela, and their children. Quiroga has achieved all of his dreams but his life is about to be shaken by his own actions. While he partakes in a forbidden affair, his daughter, Maria Elsa, has fallen in love with the son of the housemaid, challenging the most important rule of their time: the division of social classes. And, the arrival of Reynaldo Suarez, the new priest in Villa Ruiseñor, means more trouble for Armando. Maria Elsa quickly becomes seduced by this priest's charm, unable to avoid the romance that begins escalating between them. This priest will find himself stuck at a crossroads: keeping his faith or succumbing to a woman's love.
